content: Which U.S. president was a former Hollywood actor before entering politics and eventually becoming the 40th President of the United States?

The U.S. president who was a former Hollywood actor before entering politics and eventually becoming the 40th President of the United States is Ronald Reagan. Before his political career, Reagan was a film actor and served as the 33rd Governor of California. His acting career spanned over two decades, appearing in numerous films and television shows. His time in Hollywood played a significant role in shaping his public image and communication skills, which later proved beneficial in his political career.
